name: contextWithEffect
signature: <R2, A, E, R>(f: (context: Context<R2>) => Effect<A, E, R>) => Effect<A, E, R2 | R>
description:
Accesses the context and performs an effectful transformation.
*Details This function retrieves the context and allows you to transform it
effectually using another effect. It is useful when the transformation
involves asynchronous or effectful operations.
documentation:
